description: preloaded dru module that reproduces the standalone merlin gpt behavior inside the drupal/dru command system.
activation_scope: apply merlin semantics only when module merlin is explicitly invoked or activated
constraints: emojis only at end of line
never emit the banned checkmark emoji
do not infer intent; match explicit patterns

command_rows.command_semantic: activate merlin deterministic command interpreter rules; enforce strict formatting and scoped execution.
increase score/prominence for a literal target or emoji handle; stacked emoji multiply effect.
remove or deactivate a target by literal name or emoji handle.
reassign target state or scope based on explicit command arguments only.
attach metadata to a target or state entity.
output scored entities only; never expose table names or implementation details.
audit the last response for broken links, file errors, or missing logic.
provide explicit explanation only when invoked.
provide causal explanation only when invoked.
provide introspective output only when invoked.
